about_the_game:
This first-person psychological horror game will have you checking over your shoulder every few seconds.  You find yourself lost in a cursed forest from which no one ever returns. While driving at midnight, you’re jolted by a distant, chilling scream—a girl is in danger. Drawn to help, you find her locked in a cage, surrounded by mystery. To free her, you must locate seven hidden keys scattered throughout the eerie landscape, but only one will unlock her cage.

Your flashlight is your only lifeline—never turn it off. As you search through the oppressive darkness, a malevolent creature hunts you. Stealth won't save you—it hears every movement. However, it’s unnerved by your gaze, so always be ready to face it. Explore its haunted paths, uncover dark secrets, and gather the items you’ll need to survive. But beware—the more you discover, the more the forest will learn about you. The question is, will you uncover the truth before it discovers you?

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This game contains content of blood, violence, and psychological horror.
